data.actual_result: It doesn't let you select those options, but you can select 1 minute and 5 minutes
data.expected_result: You should be able to select 15 minutes, 30 minutes or 1 hour
data.short_description: You're not able to select AFK timeout above 5 minutes on Android
data.steps_to_repro: - go to server settings - go to overview - go to afk settings - try to select 15 minutes, 30 minutes or 1 hour
